meanings.definition: To a great extent; very much
meanings.sent1: She hugely enjoys playing the piano.
meanings.sent2: The children were hugely excited about the upcoming field trip.
meanings.sent3: The puppy was hugely curious about the new toy.
meanings.sent4: His kindness was hugely appreciated by everyone in the community.
meanings.sent5: The sunflowers grew hugely tall in the warm summer sun.

meanings.sent1: It was a hugely successful event with a large turnout.
meanings.sent2: The elephant is a hugely impressive animal due to its size.
meanings.sent3: The cake was hugely big, enough to feed the whole party.
meanings.sent4: The impact of the discovery was hugely significant for science.
meanings.sent5: The mountain range was hugely majestic against the evening sky.
